The game is pretty unique and has a good gameplay
The qraphics are not the best and some textures are very bad for a game that was published in the year 2016(moon, Ground, Trees, Leaves, wood planks e.t.c ) 
New maps like the yamaokas are bad designed (the house has nothing to offer, bad killer vision, useless windows)
Through the bad graphics where only the characters are good and sharp designed, the game looses the horror effect. To be honest after u played this game a while, u will notice that the game is not scary (,maybe its normal). With improve of the graphics that will increase the horror effects the game will be more scarier.
Examples are darker maps , fog that is very foggy, shining lamps through the darkness. The survivor should be in a nightmare in a lonely scary forest instead of a map with lvl design where u can see the killer from far away the loops are ez to remember and also the gen placements. These criteria are only effecting the survivors, the view of the killer is different, he is a entitys tool who is used to be in the darkness and can see clearly through the fog and darkness.
A good example for nearly scary maps are the macmillan and haddonfield. Colour layout design is well set and a darker tone is desirable.
The mechanics of the game right now are still acceptable

Напрашивается вопрос, почему я не рекомендую ЭТО хотя наиграл 1700 часов, вроде абсурд, но скажу так, до последних изменений игра была не плохой, со своими фишками, но сейчас когда в ней появилось куча проблем то не рекомендую ее к покупке. Спросите какие проблемы? Так вот это куча багов, начиная от того что ты тупо не можешь зайти в матч т.к. вылезает ошибка NAT и заканчивая кривыми хитбоксами. Зато разработчики каждую неделю клепают скинчики вместо решения проблем. 
Но если хотите компанией поиграть в нее, то почему бы и нет. НО перед покупкой подумайте очень хорошо

There's a lot of debate about whether or not this game is toxic or imbalanced but I've found that the player base is significantly more positive than toxic. Just be positive yourself and you'll have a great time. As for the balance of the game, it's at times questionable. The game itself feels as though it favours the survivors with the amount of pallets and windows that you can never hit the survivor through, being someone who plays survivor more than killer I don't always think about how hard it is for killers. Playing killer is very tough but rewarding. Most importantly, this game is a hell of a lot of fun. I still get spooked 450hrs in and always find ways to improve myself as a player. 9/10 game :D
